flawed_nl_solution:
If he had 200 fish and sells 50, he is left with 200 - 50 = <<200-50=170>>170 fish
If a third of them get spoiled 1/3 * 170 = <<170*1/3=170/3>>170/3 fish get spoiled
The remaining number of fish is now 170 - 170/3 = <<170-170/3=340/3>>340/3
He then gets 200 more to make 340/3 + 200 = <<340/3+200=940/3>>940/3 fish

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 170. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
